entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 a.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 12:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain late this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
